name: Jump to right platform
description:
A short platformer game where you must find which platforms you can stand on and which you can't!

If you see a green flag at the start of the game, click the green flag on the top left corner of the screen.

Made in 2 days, using:

Scratch: game engine, art

jsfxr: sound effects

Chrome music lab: music

Made for the Brackeys game jam 2022.1!
